title: Beer braised stew and colcannon
ingredients: ['Stew', '1.3kg stewing steak', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '80g coarsely chopped onion', '80g coarsely chopped carrot', '330ml dark beer', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', 'Colcannon', '1kg potatoes, peeled and cut into large pieces', '150g shredded cabbage', '60ml milk, warmed', '2 tablespoons butter or margarine', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 rashers bacon, cooked and diced', '2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley']
